English: Nine Chronicles
Did you make something nice?[newline]Then come and sell it here.
Korean: 괜찮은 물건을 제작했어?[newline]그럼 여기 와서 팔아봐

English: There's a lot of good stuff coming up.
Korean: 좋은 물건이 많이 올라와있어![newline]시간 나면 보고 가

English: When you're worried about selling prices[newline]check out what other people put up on them.
Korean: 판매 가격이 고민되면[newline]다른 사람들이[newline]얼마에 올렸는지 잘 살펴봐

English: You can always get back things[newline]that haven't been sold.
Korean: 아직 팔리지 않은 물건은[newline]언제든지 다시 회수할 수 있어

English: How many cats does Frey want to[newline]bring to the world..?
Unidentified creatures from Igdrasil[newline]have engulfed the whole world.
Korean: 세계수에서 생겨난 정체불명의[newline]생명체들이 온 세계를 뒤덮고 말았어..

English: You need a variety of equipment to prepare for the ordeal.
Korean: 다양한 장비가 있어야 시련을 대비할 수 있어

English: Did you collect the materials in battle?[newline]Then come to me.
I'll do my best to make newline weapons.
You want to build a stronger weapon?[newline] Gather a lot of material for the desired effect.
Korean: 더 강한 무기를 만들고 싶다고?[newline]원하는 효과의 재료를 많이 모으게

English: Do you know the fact that[newline]there is 4 elemental in the world?
Don't be too upset.[newline]have you ever heard of a consumable item?
Korean: 속성무기를 못 만든다고[newline]너무 상심하지 말게.[newline]소모템이라고 들어보았나?

English: Consumable item disappears once you use it[newline]but it works just as well.
Korean: 소모템은 한번 쓰면 사라지지만[newline]그만큼 효과가 강력하다오

English: You want more weapons?[Newline] Make a weapon and synthesize it.
Korean: 무기를 더 강화하고 싶다고?[newline]같은 무기를 만들어서 합성해보게

English: The higher the grade. the more options there are…[newline]What? You already know that? Whoo!
Korean: 높은 등급의 무기일수록[newline]많은 옵션이 붙지..[newline]뭐? 그것까지 알려줄 필욘 없다고? 흥!

English: They say there's a huge pig who won't die.
Put your name on the Hall of Fame!
To prepare for war[Newline]you have to be stronger!
You haven't been in the rankings yet? Hmm... I'm in trouble.
Korean: 아직 랭킹에 올라본 적이 없다고?[newline]흠… 곤란하군..

English: For the glorious cats[newline]the Frey is giving you the prize!
If Odin hadn't let go of[newline]Rocky's children like that..[newline]Oh! It’s nothing!
Korean: 오딘님이 로키님의 자식들을[newline]그렇게 내치지만 않았어도…[newline]앗 아무것도 아니다!

English: Don't be afraid of the enemy in front of you[newline]and trust your own inner self!
Korean: 눈 앞의 적을 두려워 하지 말고[newline]자신의 내면을 믿어라!

English: Every life has a property!
Korean: 신계의 생명은 모두 속성을 갖고 있다!

English: You can begin the expedition[newline]through the magicians below.
Korean: 아래 마법진을 누르면[newline]탐험을 시작할 수 있다옹

English: You want to collect a lot of the same ingredients?[newline]Have you fought it over and over again?
Korean: 똑같은 재료를 많이 모으고 싶다고?[newline]반복전투는 해봤나옹?

English: What monsters drop looks trivial[newline]but it makes a good material.
Korean: 몬스터가 떨어뜨리는 것들은[newline]하찮아 보이지만 좋은 재작 재료가 된다옹

The new world is balanced[newline]by the forces of four elements.
